title: Implement Multi-CI Platform Support (v0.3.0)
description: Support GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins, CircleCI, and other CI platforms beyond GitHub Actions with pluggable adapter interface

title: Agent Marketplace (v0.5.0)
description: Build system for sharing custom agents with community - discovery, installation, ratings

title: IDE Integration: VSCode Extension (v0.4.0)
description: Build VSCode extension for real-time agent feedback in editor with inline quick fixes
